subject: Baseball
Names, Personal
World Series
lead_paragraph: The Cardinals’ bullpen miscommunication that marked Game 5 tripped over simpler names like Motte and Lynn but not, amazingly enough, Rzepczynski.
snippet: The Cardinals’ bullpen miscommunication that marked Game 5 tripped over simpler names like Motte and Lynn but not, amazingly enough, Rzepczynski.
